dct_alternative_sm: Le noveau theatre du monde ou la Geographie Royal
dct_description_sm: dressé et présente au roy tres chretien par Mr. Cassini le fils ; J. Goeree del. ; G.v. Gouwen fecit.

California as an island with four northern bays. Island is labeled Californie I. with M. de Californie on its western offshore waters. Destroit d' Anien is directly north. Australia shown as an island, partially in outline.
A north polar projection with title banners in French (top left) and Latin (top right).
Planisphere is surrounded by allegorical figures in baroque style, including Atlas holding a globe in lower right.
J. Goezee del. (bottom left). G. v. Gouwen fecit. (bottom right).
Issued in his Le noveau theatre du monde ou la Geographie Royal...-- Leiden, 1713.
